channel.title: Ventyz
channel.description:
[CENTER] [B][SIZE=8][FONT=Franklin Gothic Medium][B][COLOR="#FFFFFF"]Ventyz[/COLOR][/B][/FONT][/SIZE][/B]
Server Name: Ventyz Revision: 718/728 Type: Economy Developer: Pax Magenz
[COLOR="#FFFFFF"][U][SIZE=6][url=http://ventyz.com]Visit our website[/url][/SIZE][/U][/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/viGuQ3x.png[/img]
[B][COLOR="#FFFFFF"][url=http://ventyz.com]Ventyz[/url][/COLOR][/B] is a recreation of ("RuneScape") from the year ("2012"). This project is developed and published by Pax Magenz. There should still be a big room for entertainment and that good old feeling of playing ("RuneScape") from the year ("2012") following with smooth and flawless gameplay. We wish to create a friendly community, and want to communicate with the community, their suggestions is going to 'run' the server. We wish to take private servers to the "next big step", and this is what we've done. we give you, [B][COLOR="#FFFFFF"][url=http://ventyz.com]Ventyz[/url][/COLOR][/B].
[IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/xfxm2w.gif[/img]
We have two servers, which mean two different worlds, located around the world. With these specifications we are proud to say you will have a smooth experience while playing: Up to 512GB DDR4 Memory Intel Quad Core E3-1230 3.30GHz v3 CPU Server 2008/2012 – Std/DC Dual Power Supply
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/tKwoVQ7.png[/img]
[spoiler=Game Media] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Rhudu03.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n494/darrenrulez1/loyalty_shop_special_offer.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/NI0WxMV.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/LILxKxk.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/4OfKpVp.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/NAepUoa.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/xAsJqFC.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/cnv0ObX.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/XRWdNa5.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/VB1ttxV.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Cqq866w.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/mN4Dyhm.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/gQGgqrw.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Bm4JZGW.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/94lyJ2p.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/mnUgw9U.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/rKdn53T.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/LneFKdj.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/k1dVCfl.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/TD5fKbj.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/HxzHhZF.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/s7KeUrg.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/OEQsZBW.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/TcDOwPt.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ZPRW9GS.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/jj2V1Jh.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/vubTck8.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/9ybspcj.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/6PmfqOK.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/uL7vMiy.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/V7DZi0S.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/2gmuwI1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/zDRw608.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/zdDCCZs.jpg[/img] [/spoiler]
[spoiler=The Land of Ventyz] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ArDwmNN.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/w0y8WtG.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/mOh9HBL.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/8CIk4ek.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/p9w97gl.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/UHzyW7h.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/FOegk8J.jpg[/img] [/spoiler]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/TgxwDJK.png[/img]
[spoiler=Features] [COLOR="#00FF00"]
[ul][*]Lobby [*]Money Pouch [*]Toolbelt [*]All skills [*]Bank pins [*]Gravestones [*]Friends Chats [*]Clan Chats [*]Report system [*]Notes [*]30+ bosses [*]20+ minigames [*]15+ quests [*]Flower Poker [*]Bank pin [*]Emotes [*]Old/new items look [*]Lodestones [*]Grand Exchange [*]Fairy Rings [*]Godwars [*]Squeal of Fortune [*]Loyalty Programme [*]PMod Room [*]Notes [*]Lending [*]Livid Farm [*]Censor [*]Membership[/ul]
[/COLOR] [/spoiler]
[spoiler=Quests (15/20)] [COLOR="#00FF00"]
[ul][*]The Blood Pact [*]Cook's assistant [*]Imp catcher [*]Lost city [*]Doric's Quest [*]Monkey Madness [*]Rune mysteries [*]Restless ghost [*]Demon slayer [*]Ernest the Chicken [*]Dragon slayer [*]Desert Treasure [*]Lunar Diplomacy [*]Recipe For Diaster [*]Nomad's Requiem[/ul]
[/COLOR] [/spoiler]
[spoiler=Q&A] [B]Q:[/B] Why should I choose [B][COLOR="#FFFFFF"][url=http://ventyz.com]Ventyz[/url][/COLOR][/B]? [B]A:[/B] At [B][COLOR="#FFFFFF"][url=http://ventyz.com]Ventyz[/url][/COLOR][/B] we aim to give our playerbase the best possible content, flawless gameplay and a friendly community.
[B]Q[/B]: How can I start playing? [B]A:[/B] You can either play through your browser by clicking [url=http://ventyz.com/play]here[/url], or download the desktop client [url=http://ventyz.com/Ventyz.jar]here[/url].
[B]Q:[/B] What are the benefits of purchasing a Membership? [B]A:[/B] You can read more about membership [url=http://ventyz.com/store/about]here[/url].
[B]Q:[/B] Who can I contact for further questions? [B]A:[/B] Feel free to ask any Private Message an [B][COLOR="#FFFFFF"][url=http://ventyz.com]Ventyz[/url][/COLOR][/B] Moderator [url=http://ventyz.com/community/index.php?app=members&module=messaging&section=send&do=form&fromMemberID=1]here[/url]. [/spoiler]
[spoiler=Credits] [url=http://jagex.com]Jagex Games Studio[/url] [url=http://runescape.com]RuneScape[/url] [url=http://ventyz.com]Pax Magenz[/url] You [/spoiler]
[/CENTER]

item.title: Ventyz
item.dc:creator: @noty noty
item.description:
@noty wrote:

[CENTER]
[B][SIZE=8][FONT=Franklin Gothic Medium][B][COLOR="#FFFFFF"]Ventyz[/COLOR][/B][/FONT][/SIZE][/B]

Server Name: Ventyz
Revision: 718/728
Type: Economy
Developer: Pax Magenz

[COLOR="#FFFFFF"][U][SIZE=6]Visit our website[/SIZE][/U][/COLOR]

[B][COLOR="#FFFFFF"]Ventyz[/COLOR][/B] is a recreation of (“RuneScape”) from the year (“2012”). This project is developed and published by Pax Magenz.
There should still be a big room for entertainment and that good old feeling of playing (“RuneScape”) from the year (“2012”) following with smooth and flawless gameplay. We wish to create a friendly community, and want to communicate with the community, their suggestions is going to ‘run’ the server.
We wish to take private servers to the “next big step”, and this is what we’ve done. we give you, [B][COLOR="#FFFFFF"]Ventyz[/COLOR][/B].

We have two servers, which mean two different worlds, located around the world. With these specifications we are proud to say you will have a smooth experience while playing:
Up to 512GB DDR4 Memory
Intel Quad Core E3-1230 3.30GHz v3 CPU
Server 2008/2012 – Std/DC
Dual Power Supply

[spoiler=Game Media]


































[/spoiler]

[spoiler=The Land of Ventyz]







[/spoiler]

[spoiler=Features]
[COLOR="#00FF00"]

[ul][]Lobby
[]Money Pouch
[]Toolbelt

[*]Nomad’s Requiem[/ul]

[/COLOR]
[/spoiler]

[spoiler=Q&A]
[B]Q:[/B] Why should I choose [B][COLOR="#FFFFFF"]Ventyz[/COLOR][/B]?
[B]A:[/B] At [B][COLOR="#FFFFFF"]Ventyz[/COLOR][/B] we aim to give our playerbase the best possible content, flawless gameplay and a friendly community.

[B]Q[/B]: How can I start playing?
[B]A:[/B] You can either play through your browser by clicking here, or download the desktop client here.

[B]Q:[/B] What are the benefits of purchasing a Membership?
[B]A:[/B] You can read more about membership here.

[B]Q:[/B] Who can I contact for further questions?
[B]A:[/B] Feel free to ask any Private Message an [B][COLOR="#FFFFFF"]Ventyz[/COLOR][/B] Moderator here.
[/spoiler]

[spoiler=Credits]
Jagex Games Studio
RuneScape
Pax Magenz
You
[/spoiler]

[/CENTER]
